trans-unit.source: Contains methods, properties, and events to support navigation.
trans-unit.target: Contiene metodi, proprietà ed eventi per supportare la navigazione.

trans-unit.source: NavigationService encapsulates the ability to download content within the context of a browser-style navigation.
trans-unit.target: NavigationService incapsula la possibilità di scaricare il contenuto all'interno del contesto di navigazione di tipo browser.

trans-unit.source: Content can be any type of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] object and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] files.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto può essere qualsiasi tipo di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] oggetto e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] file.

trans-unit.source: In general, however, pages are the preferred as the way to package content for navigation (see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>).
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, in generale, le pagine sono il modo migliore per contenuto del pacchetto per la navigazione (vedere <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.source: Content can be navigated to by providing an instance of an object and calling an overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method that accepts an object: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> Alternatively, content can be navigated to by passing a relative or absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to one of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method overloads that accepts a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> When content is navigated to by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], NavigationService will return an object that contains the content.
trans-unit.target: Possibile spostarsi sul contenuto fornendo un'istanza di un oggetto e chiamando un overload del <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>metodo che accetta un oggetto:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>in alternativa, il contenuto può essere esplorazione al passando un valore relativo o assoluto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] a uno del <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>overload del metodo che accetta un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>quando ci si sposta al contenuto da [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], NavigationService restituirà un oggetto che contiene il contenuto.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile tenere traccia della durata di un tipo di spostamento tramite gli eventi seguenti:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed).
trans-unit.target: Non tutti gli eventi ogni volta che si verifica un'operazione di navigazione; il set di eventi che vengono generati è determinato dal tipo di navigazione che si verifica (contenuto o frammento di contenuto) e modalità di completamento di navigazione (annullato, arrestato o non riuscito).

trans-unit.source: The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events are raised: ![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") During or after a navigation, NavigationService provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content being navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>), the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A>), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Nella figura seguente viene illustrata la sequenza in cui vengono generati: ![grafico del flusso di navigazione pagina](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "grafico del flusso di navigazione pagina") durante o dopo una navigazione, NavigationService fornisce informazioni sul contenuto su cui viene spostato, inclusi il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenuto a cui si accede (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>), il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenuto corrente (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A>) e un oggetto che contiene il contenuto che è stato aperto (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to, NavigationService records the navigation as an entry in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Quando ci si sposta al contenuto, NavigationService registra lo spostamento di una voce nella cronologia di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Viene aggiunta una voce per eseguire il backup di cronologia di navigazione quando si verifica una nuova navigazione, chiamando la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>metodo, o passando a una voce nella cronologia di navigazione in avanti, chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Una voce viene aggiunta alla cronologia di navigazione in avanti, passare a una voce nella cronologia di navigazione, chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A>report se sono presenti voci presenti nella cronologia di navigazione in avanti, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, può essere rimossa la voce più recente nella cronologia di navigazione all'indietro chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, NavigationService does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, NavigationService non archivia un'istanza di un oggetto contenuto nella cronologia di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: Instead, NavigationService creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, NavigationService crea una nuova istanza dell'oggetto contenuto ogni volta che si accede tramite la cronologia di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Questo comportamento è progettato per evitare il consumo di memoria eccessiva quando un numero elevato e grandi porzioni di contenuto sono a cui si accede.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, lo stato del contenuto non viene memorizzato da uno spostamento a quella successiva.

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] vengono illustrate diverse tecniche che è possibile archiviare parte dello stato di una parte del contenuto nella cronologia di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>, you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>, è anche possibile memorizzare più insiemi di stato per un'istanza singola pagina.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: NavigationService is `sealed` class and, therefore, cannot be instantiated; instead, NavigationService is used by navigators to enable navigation.
trans-unit.target: È NavigationService `sealed` classe e, pertanto, non è possibile creare istanze; NavigationService viene utilizzata una connessione da strumenti di spostamento per attivare la navigazione.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], there are two navigators: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], esistono due navigatori: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> ,</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience.
trans-unit.target: In modo visivo, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] utilizzare [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] come uno strumento di spostamento, per offrire un'esperienza utente integrata.

trans-unit.source: Physically, however, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> as the navigator; the <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, and the navigation history that is managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] in the following ways: - When content is navigated to by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> from within an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the relevant navigation history entries are also added to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Fisicamente, tuttavia, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] effettivamente utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>come strumento di navigazione; il <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>proprietà di un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] in esecuzione in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] restituirà un riferimento al <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>e la cronologia di navigazione è gestita dal <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>è integrato con la cronologia di navigazione è gestita da [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] nei modi seguenti: - quando si accede contenuto chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>dall'interno un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] voci della cronologia di navigazione rilevanti vengono aggiunti anche per [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] cronologia di navigazione.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - When entries in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] are selected, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] causes NavigationService to navigate back or forwards to the content that is associated with those entries.
trans-unit.target: -Quando le voci nel [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigazione [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] sono selezionate, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] NavigationService di spostarsi indietro o la inoltra al contenuto che è associata a tali voci.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> can provide its own navigation history, or use the navigation history of the navigator that hosts it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>grado di fornire la propria cronologia di navigazione, o utilizzare la cronologia di navigazione dello strumento di spostamento che ospita tale</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> provides its own navigation history, it can display its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to navigate through the entries in navigation history; those entries are not added to the navigation history of the host navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]) and, consequently, cannot be navigated to from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of each (see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>fornisce la propria cronologia di navigazione, è possibile visualizzare il proprio navigazione [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per spostarsi tra le voci nella cronologia di navigazione; tali voci non vengono aggiunti alla cronologia di navigazione dello strumento di selezione host (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]) e, di conseguenza, non può essere eseguita dalla navigazione [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] di ogni (vedere <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry to back navigation history that contains a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge una voce per eseguire il backup di cronologia di navigazione che contiene un <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: AddBackEntry, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>, and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> are used to help remember multiple sets of state for the current content.
trans-unit.target: AddBackEntry, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>, e <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState>vengono utilizzati per memorizzare più insiemi di stato per il contenuto corrente.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that represents application-defined state that is associated with a specific piece of content.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta lo stato definito dall'applicazione associato a una parte specifica del contenuto.

trans-unit.source: state is , and a object isn't returned from .
trans-unit.target: stateè e un oggetto non viene restituito da .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se è presente almeno una voce nella cronologia di navigazione all'indietro.

trans-unit.source: CanGoBack to determine whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: CanGoBack per determinare se è presente almeno una voce nella cronologia di navigazione all'indietro.

trans-unit.source: This property should be inspected before calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>; if <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> is called and there are no entries in back navigation history, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà deve essere controllata prima di chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>; Se <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>viene chiamato e non sono presenti voci nella cronologia di navigazione all'indietro, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > that if navigation history is shared by multiple navigators (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), the most recent entry in back navigation history may not have been added by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> for the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > che se cronologia di navigazione è condiviso da più strumenti di spostamento (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), più recente nella cronologia di navigazione può non sono stati aggiunti dal <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>per lo strumento di navigazione corrente.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is at least one entry in back navigation history; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è presente almeno una voce nella cronologia di navigazione all'indietro. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se è presente almeno una voce nella cronologia di navigazione in avanti.

trans-unit.source: CanGoForward to determine whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: CanGoForward per determinare se è presente almeno una voce nella cronologia di navigazione in avanti.

trans-unit.source: This property should be inspected before calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>; if <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> is called and there are no entries in forward navigation history, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà deve essere controllata prima di chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>; Se <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>viene chiamato e non sono presenti voci nella cronologia di navigazione in avanti, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is at least one entry in forward navigation history; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è presente almeno una voce nella cronologia di navigazione in avanti. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the object that contains the current content.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un riferimento all'oggetto che contiene il contenuto corrente.

trans-unit.source: Content can be set in one of two ways: - Directly, by setting it to a reference to an object.
trans-unit.target: Contenuto può essere impostato in uno dei due modi seguenti: - direttamente, impostandolo su un riferimento a un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: - Indirectly, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Indirettamente, chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> initiates a new navigation; since navigation is asynchronous, Content won't return a value if it is inspected immediately after being set.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>Avvia una nuova navigazione; poiché lo spostamento è asincrono, il contenuto non verrà restituito un valore se viene controllato immediatamente dopo l'impostazione.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: An object that is a reference to the object that contains the current content.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che è un riferimento all'oggetto che contiene il contenuto corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content that was last navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenuto che è stato aperto ultima.

trans-unit.source: The value of the CurrentSource property is not changed until navigation to a different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] has completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà CurrentSource non viene modificato finché navigazione a un altro [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] è stata completata correttamente.

trans-unit.source: CurrentSource can be set with a fragment-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: CurrentSource può essere impostata con un solo frammento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> for the content that was last navigated to, if navigated to by using a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Uri>per il contenuto che è stato ultima aperto, se si accede tramite un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when navigation to a content fragment begins, which occurs immediately, if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded, if the desired fragment is in different content.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando inizia la navigazione verso un frammento di contenuto, che si verifica immediatamente, se il frammento desiderato è il contenuto corrente, o dopo l'origine [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] contenuto è stato caricato, se il frammento desiderato è in un contenuto diverso.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"></xref> for the navigator whose content contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento di <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"> </xref> per lo strumento di spostamento il cui contenuto contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A navigator has a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that handles content navigation.
trans-unit.target: È uno strumento di spostamento un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>che gestisce lo spostamento del contenuto.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] has two navigators: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]dispone di due navigatori: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: To process navigation requests and manage navigation lifetime, a navigator uses the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] navigation service, which is implemented as the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> class.
trans-unit.target: Per elaborare le richieste di navigazione e gestire la durata dello spostamento, utilizza uno strumento di spostamento di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] servizio di spostamento che viene implementato come <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: Content that is hosted by a navigator can get a reference to the navigator's <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> by calling the GetNavigationService method.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto ospitato da uno strumento di spostamento può ottenere un riferimento per lo strumento di navigazione <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>chiamando il metodo GetNavigationService.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: GetNavigationService returns `null` when the `dependencyObject`: - Is a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce GetNavigationService `null` quando il `dependencyObject`:-è un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - Is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> that: 1.
trans-unit.target: -È un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>che: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: Is hosted by another navigator.
trans-unit.target: È ospitato da un altro strumento di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: Has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Is not part of content that is hosted by a navigator.
trans-unit.target: -È non fa parte del contenuto che è ospitato da uno strumento di spostamento.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] offers two shortcuts for acquiring a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that processed the navigation to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> can be accessed from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> itself by getting the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]offre due collegamenti per acquisire un riferimento al <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>:: il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>che ha elaborato la navigazione a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>sono accessibili dal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>ottenendo il valore della relativa <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that is used by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> to process navigation can be accessed by getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>utilizzato da un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>per elaborare lo spostamento, è possibile accedere tramite il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> in content that is hosted by a navigator.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> nel contenuto ospitato da uno strumento di spostamento.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"></xref> for the navigator whose content contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>; can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> in some cases (see Remarks).
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento di <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"> </xref> per lo strumento di spostamento il cui contenuto contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref>; può essere <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> in alcuni casi (vedere la sezione Osservazioni).

trans-unit.source: The dependencyObject parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The dependencyObject parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the most recent entry in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: Consente di passare alla voce più recente nella cronologia di navigazione, se è presente.

trans-unit.source: Before calling GoBack, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> property can be inspected to determine whether there are entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Prima di chiamare GoBack, il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>proprietà può essere controllata per determinare se sono presenti voci nella cronologia di navigazione all'indietro.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: GoBack is called when there are no entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: GoBack viene chiamato quando non sono presenti voci nella cronologia di navigazione all'indietro.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the most recent entry in forward navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: Passare alla voce più recente nella cronologia di navigazione in avanti, se presente.

trans-unit.source: Before calling GoForward, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> property can be inspected to determine whether there are entries in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Prima di chiamare GoForward, il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A>proprietà può essere controllata per determinare se sono presenti voci nella cronologia di navigazione in avanti.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A>

trans-unit.source: GoForward is called when there are no entries in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: GoForward viene chiamato quando non sono presenti voci nella cronologia di navigazione in avanti.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when content that was navigated to has been loaded, parsed, and has begun rendering.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il contenuto che è stato aperto è stato caricato, analizzato e sottoposto a rendering.

trans-unit.source: You handle LoadCompleted if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request upon load completion.
trans-unit.target: Gestire LoadCompleted se si desidera individuare informazioni pertinenti sulla richiesta di spostamento al completamento del caricamento.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the LoadCompleted event handler, and includes: - The content and its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Queste informazioni sono disponibili le <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>oggetto viene passato al gestore dell'evento LoadCompleted e include:-il contenuto e il relativo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: -Lo strumento di navigazione (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Dati aggiuntivi, se la navigazione è stata avviata chiamando uno <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Response details (using a <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> object).
trans-unit.target: -Dettagli risposta (utilizzando un <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>oggetto).</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: LoadCompleted is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> is raised.
trans-unit.target: LoadCompleted non viene generato quando la pagina di origine non è stata trovata o caricata, nel qual caso <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>viene generato.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises LoadCompleted, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>Genera LoadCompleted, genera anche <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>evento il <xref:System.Windows.Application>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to content that is contained by an object.
trans-unit.target: Passare in modo asincrono il contenuto da un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Navigate will navigate to the <xref:System.Object> specified by `root` if the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event is not cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Passare verrà passare il <xref:System.Object>specificato da `root` se vengono soddisfatte le condizioni seguenti: - il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>evento non viene annullato.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: - A web request (see <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) can be created.
trans-unit.target: -Una richiesta web (vedere <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) possono essere creati.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: If `root` is `null`, the existing content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) is cleared.
trans-unit.target: Se `root` è `null`, il contenuto esistente (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) viene cancellato.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Durante il download del contenuto Web, è possibile ricevere un'eccezione Web (ad esempio 404: File non trovato).

trans-unit.source: You can handle such exceptions from <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile gestire tali eccezioni da <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene il contenuto a cui passare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se non viene annullata un'operazione di navigazione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to content that is specified by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Esplorare in modo asincrono il contenuto specificato da un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The value of `source` can be a Web [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] or a valid pack [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] (see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Il valore di `source` può essere un sito Web [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] o un pacchetto valido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] (vedere [URI di tipo Pack in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).

trans-unit.source: Navigate will navigate to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] specified by `source` if the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event is not cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Passare verrà passare il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] specificato da `source` se vengono soddisfatte le condizioni seguenti: - il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>evento non viene annullato.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: - A web request (see <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) can be created.
trans-unit.target: -Una richiesta web (vedere <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) possono essere creati.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: If `source` is `null`, the existing content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) is cleared.
trans-unit.target: Se `source` è `null`, il contenuto esistente (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) viene cancellato.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Durante il download del contenuto Web, è possibile ricevere un'eccezione Web (ad esempio 404: File non trovato).

trans-unit.source: You can handle such exceptions from <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile gestire tali eccezioni da <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>

trans-unit.source: You can use Navigate to navigate to a content fragment.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare Navigate per passare a un frammento di contenuto.

trans-unit.source: If the content identified by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is the current content, it is not downloaded again.
trans-unit.target: Se il contenuto è identificato dal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] è il contenuto corrente, non viene scaricato di nuovo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Uri>oggetto inizializzato con il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] per il contenuto desiderato.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se non viene annullata un'operazione di navigazione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to content that is contained by an object, and pass an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Spostarsi in modo asincrono il contenuto da un oggetto e passare un oggetto che contiene i dati da utilizzare per l'elaborazione durante lo spostamento.

trans-unit.source: This method has the same behavior as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, although an object is passed instead of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo ha lo stesso comportamento come <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, anche se un oggetto viene passato al posto di un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene il contenuto a cui passare.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene i dati da utilizzare per l'elaborazione durante lo spostamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se non viene annullata un'operazione di navigazione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to source content located at a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], and pass an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Esplorare in modo asincrono il contenuto di origine si trova in un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]e passare un oggetto che contiene i dati da utilizzare per l'elaborazione durante lo spostamento.

trans-unit.source: Since navigations are asynchronous, it is possible for multiple navigations to be in progress at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Poiché gli spostamenti sono asincroni, è possibile che più spostamenti siano in corso nello stesso momento.

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are two child frames on a single page, both frames could be navigating.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se sono presenti due frame figlio in una singola pagina, è Impossibile esplorazione entrambi i frame.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the various navigation events that are raised by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> may be raised multiple times, one for each piece of content that is being navigated to, and not necessarily in order that the navigations were requested.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, i vari eventi di spostamento generati da <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>possono essere generati più volte, una per ogni parte del contenuto che viene esplorato e non necessariamente in modo che non sono stati richiesti gli spostamenti.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, if a particular navigation request needs to process data that is specific to the individual request, it cannot use data that is available to all navigation requests.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, se una particolare richiesta di spostamento deve elaborare i dati specifici per la singola richiesta, non può utilizzare i dati disponibili a tutte le richieste di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use `navigationState` to pass data for navigation processing that is specific to one navigation request.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile utilizzare `navigationState` per passare i dati per un'elaborazione di navigazione è specifico per una richiesta di spostamento.

trans-unit.source: The following event arguments provide access to navigation state: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> (passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event).
trans-unit.target: Gli argomenti dell'evento seguenti forniscono accesso allo stato di navigazione:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>(passato per il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>evento).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> (passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> event handlers).
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>(passato per il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>i gestori di eventi).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Uri>oggetto inizializzato con il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] per il contenuto desiderato.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene i dati da utilizzare per l'elaborazione durante lo spostamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se non viene annullata un'operazione di navigazione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to source content located at a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], pass an object containing navigation state for processing during navigation, and sandbox the content.
trans-unit.target: Esplorare in modo asincrono il contenuto di origine si trova in un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], passare un oggetto contenente lo stato di navigazione per l'elaborazione durante la navigazione e sandbox il contenuto.

trans-unit.source: This method is only for standalone applications and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è solo per applicazioni autonome e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] contenuto.

trans-unit.source: This method exhibits the same behavior as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and extends it by ensuring that the content that is being downloaded is placed into a partial trust security sandbox (with the default Internet zone set of permissions - see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo presenta lo stesso comportamento di <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, e la estende assicurando che il contenuto che si sta scaricando viene inserito in una sandbox di sicurezza di attendibilità parziale (con il set di autorizzazioni - area Internet predefinito vedere [sicurezza con attendibilità parziale WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Uri>oggetto inizializzato con il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] per il contenuto desiderato.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene i dati da utilizzare per l'elaborazione durante lo spostamento.

trans-unit.source: Download content into a partial trust security sandbox (with the default Internet zone set of permissions, if <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Scaricare il contenuto in una sandbox di sicurezza di attendibilità parziale (con il valore predefinito di Internet zona set di autorizzazioni, se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se non viene annullata un'operazione di navigazione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content that is being navigated to has been found, and is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content*> property, although it may not have completed loading.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il contenuto che si sta spostando è stato trovato ed è disponibile il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content*>proprietà, anche se potrebbe non avere completato il caricamento.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content*>

trans-unit.source: You handle Navigated if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading commences.
trans-unit.target: Gestire Navigated se si desidera individuare informazioni pertinenti sulla richiesta di spostamento all'inizio del download.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the Navigated event handler, and includes: - The source page.
trans-unit.target: Queste informazioni sono disponibili le <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>oggetto viene passato al gestore dell'evento Navigated e include:-la pagina di origine.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When Navigated is raised, at least part of the source page's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] tree has been parsed, and attached to target content control.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato Navigated, almeno una parte della pagina di origine [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] albero è stato analizzato e associato al controllo del contenuto di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: - The requested [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: -La richiesta [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: -Lo strumento di navigazione (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Dati aggiuntivi, se la navigazione è stata avviata chiamando uno <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Response details (using a <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> object).
trans-unit.target: -Dettagli risposta (utilizzando un <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>oggetto).</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: Navigated is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> is raised.
trans-unit.target: Si accede non viene generato quando la pagina di origine non è stata trovata o caricata, nel qual caso <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>viene generato.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>Genera <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>, genera anche <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>evento il <xref:System.Windows.Application>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new navigation is requested.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene richiesto un nuovo spostamento.

trans-unit.source: Navigating is raised when a new navigation is requested, but before the source content is requested, including when: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Spostamento viene generato quando viene richiesta una nuova navigazione, ma prima che il contenuto è richiesto origine, incluso quando:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> is called (or an entry is selected from a navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>viene chiamato (o da un'operazione di navigazione viene selezionata una voce [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A content fragment is navigated to.
trans-unit.target: -Un frammento di contenuto si accede.

trans-unit.source: You handle Navigating if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request before navigation starts.
trans-unit.target: Gestire Navigating se si desidera individuare informazioni pertinenti sulla richiesta di spostamento prima dell'inizio dello spostamento.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> object that is passed to the Navigating event handler.
trans-unit.target: Queste informazioni sono disponibili le <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>oggetto passato al gestore dell'evento Navigating.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object for the navigation is created and available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> parameter; because the actual request hasn't been made at this point, you can reconfigure the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>dell'oggetto per la navigazione viene creato e reso disponibile dal <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>parametro; perché non è stata effettuata la richiesta a questo punto, è possibile riconfigurare il <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>dell'oggetto, se necessario.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: You also handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> to cancel navigation, if required, by setting <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> to true.
trans-unit.target: È anche possibile gestire <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>per annullare lo spostamento, se necessario, impostando <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>su true.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you cancel navigation, no other navigation events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Se si annulla la navigazione, vengono generati altri eventi di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your application is hosted in the browser, you cannot prevent the user from navigating away from your application by canceling the Navigating event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se l'applicazione è ospitata nel browser, è possibile impedire all'utente di uscire dal applicazione annullando l'evento Navigating.

trans-unit.source: After the first piece of content is navigated to by a navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), each piece of content that is navigated away from is added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver eseguito la prima parte del contenuto è uno strumento di navigazione (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), ogni parte del contenuto che ci si sposta viene aggiunta alla cronologia di navigazione.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: If you need to save state information about the content you are navigating away from, you can add the state to the journal entry for that content by setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A> with a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario salvare il contenuto si sposta da informazioni di stato, è possibile aggiungere lo stato alla voce di registrazione per il contenuto impostando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A>con un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises Navigating, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>Genera Navigating, genera anche <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>evento il <xref:System.Windows.Application>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an error occurs while navigating to the requested content.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si verifica un errore durante lo spostamento verso il contenuto richiesto.

trans-unit.source: When either a <xref:System.Net.WebException> or an <xref:System.IO.IOException> is thrown during a navigation, the NavigationFailed event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando sia un <xref:System.Net.WebException>o <xref:System.IO.IOException>viene generata durante un'operazione di navigazione, l'evento viene generato di NavigationFailed.</xref:System.IO.IOException> </xref:System.Net.WebException>

trans-unit.source: NavigationFailed is passed a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs> that encapsulates information about both the exception and the details of the navigation that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: NavigationFailed viene passato un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs>che incapsula informazioni sull'eccezione e i dettagli di navigazione che ha causato l'eccezione.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When an exception results from a failed navigation, and is unhandled, the following events are raised in the order listed: - NavigationFailed.
trans-unit.target: Quando un'eccezione dovuta a una navigazione non riuscita e non viene gestita, gli eventi seguenti vengono generati nell'ordine elencato:-NavigationFailed.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: If a navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) is hosted by one or more navigators, `NavigationFailed` is not raised on any of them.
trans-unit.target: Se uno strumento di spostamento (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) è ospitata da uno o più strumenti di navigazione, `NavigationFailed` non viene generato in ciascuno di essi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs periodically during a download to provide navigation progress information.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica periodicamente durante un download per fornire informazioni sullo stato di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: NavigationProgress is passed a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs> which exposes the following progress information: - Number of bytes downloaded so far (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A>).
trans-unit.target: NavigationProgress viene passato un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs>che espone le informazioni sullo stato seguenti:-numero di byte scaricati (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - Number of total bytes to download (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A>).
trans-unit.target: -Numero totale di byte per il download (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A>

trans-unit.source: NavigationProgress is raised once for every 1024 bytes of content downloaded, and once more if the number of remaining bytes is ever less than 1024 bytes.
trans-unit.target: NavigationProgress viene generato una volta per ogni 1024 byte del contenuto scaricato e ancora una volta se il numero di byte rimanenti è minore di 1024 byte.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, handling NavigationProgress provides a useful way to track and display the progress of a current download.
trans-unit.target: Per questo motivo, la gestione NavigationProgress fornisce un modo utile per tenere traccia e visualizzare lo stato di avanzamento di un download corrente.

trans-unit.source: NavigationProgress won't be raised in some cases, such as when the same piece of content is navigated to, or when a content fragment is navigated to on content that is currently loaded (that is, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: NavigationProgress non può essere generato in alcuni casi, ad esempio quando la stessa parte di contenuto si accede o quando ci si sposta da un frammento di contenuto sul contenuto che è attualmente caricato (vale a dire, il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>proprietà).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: When navigating to a compiled XAML resource, the final NavigationProgress event may not be raised.
trans-unit.target: Durante la navigazione in una risorsa XAML compilata, l'evento NavigationProgress finale non può essere generato.

trans-unit.source: This means that at the end of the download, the last reported <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A> value may not equal the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa che al termine del download, l'ultimo segnalato <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A>valore potrebbe non essere uguali di <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> event to be notified when the navigation has finished.
trans-unit.target: Gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>eventi per ricevere una notifica quando la navigazione è terminata.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises NavigationProgress, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=fullName> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>Genera NavigationProgress, genera anche <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=fullName>evento il <xref:System.Windows.Application>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading*> method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading*>metodo viene chiamato o quando è richiesto un nuovo spostamento durante un'operazione di navigazione corrente è in corso.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading*>

trans-unit.source: You handle NavigationStopped if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Gestire NavigationStopped se è necessario individuare informazioni pertinenti sulla richiesta di spostamento durante il download viene interrotto.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the NavigationStopped event handler, and includes: - The requested [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Queste informazioni sono disponibili le <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>oggetto viene passato al gestore dell'evento NavigationStopped e include:-la richiesta [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: -Lo strumento di navigazione (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: -Dati aggiuntivi, se la navigazione è stata avviata chiamando uno <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises NavigationStopped, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=fullName> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>Genera NavigationStopped, genera anche <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=fullName>evento il <xref:System.Windows.Application>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Reloads the current content.
trans-unit.target: Ricarica il contenuto corrente.

trans-unit.source: If the current content (specified by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> property) is navigated to again, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> does not download the content again.
